alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 24 at 1:46AM MDT until March 25 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT ABOVE 8000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 8000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility at times. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
